docs.lead_paragraph: ANNAPOLIS, Md., May 26 Gov. Marvin Mandel of Maryland vetoed today legislation that would have removed all state restrictions on abortions. The Governor emphasized that he had based his decision on legal rather than ethical grounds. He said:

headline.main: Liberalized Abortion Bill Is Vetoed in Maryland; Governor Cites Legal, Not Ethical, Basis for Move

docs.snippet: ANNAPOLIS, Md., May 26 Gov. Marvin Mandel of Maryland vetoed today legislation that would have removed all state restrictions on abortions.  The Governor emphasized that he had based his decision on legal rather than ethical grounds. He said:
